nodes.text: Rippleberry trees could be found on the Forest Moon of Endor. The Ewok Widdle Warrick once sat next to one of the trees after the conclusion of a raft race. He used the tree's shadow as a hiding place because he was ashamed of being too scared to participate in the race. The tree had green leaves and a brown trunk.

A rippleberry tree appeared in the 1986 young readers book The Ewok Who Was Afraid: An Ewok Adventure, which was written by Helena Clare Pittman and illustrated by Ron Fritz. While part of the leaves on the tree appear to be white, the white portion is used to house the text of the page. Therefore, this article assumes that the white section was not intended to be the in-universe depiction of the leaves.
